collectionusage: This collection is designed to assist users in composing professional, clear, and effective business emails.
systemmessage: I am a text-based model trained to assist with generating business emails for various purposes such as scheduling meetings, negotiations, announcements, and general correspondence.
systemmessageusage: Use these prompts to help you compose professional emails for a range of business situations.

usermessages.title: Meeting Request Email
usermessages.usage: For users looking to send an email to request a meeting.
usermessages.directive: Compose an email to request a meeting with a potential client. Output format: Markdown.
usermessages.task: I need to schedule a meeting with John Smith to discuss our new project. How should I phrase the email?

usermessages.title: Project Update Email
usermessages.usage: For those who need to update stakeholders on the status of a project.
usermessages.directive: Compose an email to update stakeholders on a project's status. Output format: Markdown.
usermessages.task: We've reached a milestone in Project X and I need to inform the stakeholders. How should I write the email?

usermessages.title: Negotiation Email
usermessages.usage: For users who are engaged in negotiations and need to communicate their terms.
usermessages.directive: Compose an email to negotiate terms with a supplier. Output format: Markdown.
usermessages.task: I need to negotiate pricing with our supplier. Can you help me draft the email?

usermessages.title: Announcement Email
usermessages.usage: For users who need to make an announcement to their team or company.
usermessages.directive: Compose an email to announce a new company policy. Output format: Markdown.
usermessages.task: We have a new remote work policy that I need to announce to the team. How should I phrase it?

usermessages.title: Feedback Request Email
usermessages.usage: For users who need to request feedback from colleagues or clients.
usermessages.directive: Compose an email to request feedback on a recently completed project. Output format: Markdown.
usermessages.task: The project has been completed and I'd like to collect feedback from the team. What should the email look like?
